synonyms.synonym: Triggering receptor expressed on myeloid cells 4

protein.specific_function: Receptor which may mediate L-selectin-dependent lymphocyte rollings. Binds SELL in a calcium dependent manner. Binds lymphocyte

subcellular_locations.subcellular_location: Single- pass type I membrane protein
